name: URLSessionTask.State
desc: Constants for determining the current state of a task.

items.name: case running
items.desc: The task is currently being serviced by the session.

items.name: case suspended
items.desc: The task was suspended by the app.

items.name: case canceling
items.desc: The task has received a cancel message.

items.name: case completed
items.desc: The task has completed (without being canceled), and the task's delegate receives no further callbacks.
